OOC: It's okay, he was out anyways!

Bic:

The spark reentered its familiar compartment and soon brought some 
life back to the metal hull. Blackfang didn't wake up right away, but 
the monitors showed he was alive. As for the effectiveness of the 
repairs, only time could tell...

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> Wheeljack-X::
> 
> "Slow down, cowboy - the hardest part's already done." Jackie 
assures 
> him, not noticing Nightlight.  "Just gotta slide this thing into 
your 
> chest compartment ..."  (Forgive me if I overstep my limits here.)  
> He pops the aforementioned cavity open and gingerly moves 
Blackfang's 
> spark into place.  Closing Rodimus up, he becomes his normal self 
> again.  "There!  Now, take two Asprin and call me in the morning."
>
